PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-05712010-05-13,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (743 - Non-Medicinal Ingredients)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (743 - NON-MEDICINAL INGREDIENTS) to require the labelling of non-medicinal ingredients on the outer labels of non-prescription drugs for human use to assist individuals in avoiding life-threatening allergens and agents for which they have a history of adverse reactions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0105 Publication Date: 2010-05-26
AttachmentsAttachment
